ygData.subject: Re: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I found Ice of Velious several times on Pickclaws in Highkeep. Not very often, but more often than runes anyway. As for mages and necro words looking
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 20 Jul 1999, Martin Matthiesen wrote:
> Thank you for you response. I am looking for any and all of them. I have
> bought Ice of Velious but failed in my research. Any hints are appreciated.
> Let me know if you need a list of them. I need both words and components.

I found Ice of Velious several times on Pickclaws in Highkeep. Not very
often, but more often than runes anyway.
As for mages and necro words looking different, I agree it's a bit
confusing. I *think* (but am not sure at all) that mage words are
stackable and necro words aren't. Either that or they forgot to make some
words stackable and those I checked matched that rule.

Ramagh,
Level 25 Erudite Wizard,
Fenin Ro.
